Cybersecurity Services

Specialized solutions that protect today and scale tomorrow

Each service is designed for companies that understand cybersecurity is an investment, not an expense. Proven methodologies, cutting-edge tools, and a practical approach that delivers measurable results.

Incident response

Security Audits

Comprehensive infrastructure assessment

We identify vulnerabilities before attackers do using proven methodologies and cutting-edge tools.

The Problem

Security breaches cost an average of €4.45M per incident. Most originate from known but unpatched vulnerabilities.

Our Solution

Our audits follow OWASP, NIST, and ISO 27001 standards, providing a complete risk map with clear prioritization.

Key Benefits

  • 85% reduction in threat detection time
  • Guaranteed regulatory compliance (GDPR, PCI-DSS)
  • Average ROI of 300% in the first year
  • Detailed executive and technical reports

What's included?

  • Automated vulnerability analysis
  • Manual critical code review
  • Security configuration testing
  • Policy and procedure evaluation
  • Targeted attack simulation

Deliverables

  • Executive report with risk summary
  • Detailed technical documentation
  • Prioritized remediation plan
  • Stakeholder presentation
  • Post-implementation follow-up
Request Security Audits arrow-up-right

Advanced Pentesting

Real-world attack simulation

We test your systems' resilience through controlled attacks that replicate real cybercriminal techniques.

The Problem

68% of organizations discover breaches months after the initial attack. Systems appear secure until they're compromised.

Our Solution

We execute ethical attacks following PTES methodology, simulating everything from script kiddies to advanced APTs.

Key Benefits

  • Real validation of security controls
  • Identification of complex attack vectors
  • Improved response protocols
  • Resistance certification for audits

What's included?

  • Web and mobile application pentesting
  • Network infrastructure testing
  • Controlled social engineering
  • Physical security analysis
  • Red team exercises

Deliverables

  • Detailed penetration report
  • Exploitation evidence (PoC)
  • CVSS risk matrix
  • Hardening recommendations
  • Free post-fix retesting
Request Advanced Pentesting arrow-up-right

System Hardening

Strengthening and secure configuration

We configure and strengthen servers, networks, and applications following security best practices.

The Problem

Default configurations are insecure. 95% of successful attacks exploit weak or incorrect configurations.

Our Solution

We apply CIS security baselines, DISA STIG, and technology and sector-specific benchmarks.

Key Benefits

  • 90% reduction in attack surface
  • Automatic standards compliance
  • Improved system response times
  • Complete change documentation

What's included?

  • Linux/Windows server hardening
  • Secure database configuration
  • Cloud infrastructure strengthening
  • Web application securization
  • Access control implementation

Deliverables

  • Automated configuration scripts
  • Applied baseline documentation
  • Continuous verification checklist
  • Maintenance policies
  • Technical team training
Request System Hardening arrow-up-right

Incident Response

Rapid response protocol

Immediate response to security breaches with complete forensic analysis and effective containment.

The Problem

Average containment time is 287 days. Each additional day increases cost by €30K and reputational damage.

Our Solution

24/7 protocol with <2h response, following NIST methodology for containment, eradication, and recovery.

Key Benefits

  • Containment in less than 2 hours
  • Legal evidence preservation
  • Minimized downtime
  • Transparent stakeholder communication

What's included?

  • Digital forensic analysis
  • Containment and eradication
  • System recovery
  • Crisis communication
  • Lessons learned

Deliverables

  • Complete forensic report
  • Detailed incident timeline
  • Legally preserved evidence
  • Post-incident improvement plan
  • Insurance/legal documentation
Request Incident Response arrow-up-right

GDPR Consulting

Comprehensive regulatory compliance

Complete advisory for GDPR compliance and other data protection regulations.

The Problem

GDPR fines can reach 4% of annual turnover. 73% of companies still don't fully comply.

Our Solution

We implement a comprehensive compliance program with impact assessments, policies, and procedures.

Key Benefits

  • Guaranteed regulatory compliance
  • Reduced sanction risk
  • Improved customer trust
  • Competitive advantage in tenders

What's included?

  • Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA)
  • Privacy policies
  • Breach notification procedures
  • Team training
  • Compliance audits

Deliverables

  • Processing activities record
  • GDPR policies and procedures
  • Consent templates
  • Personalized training plan
  • Compliance certificate
Request GDPR Consulting arrow-up-right

Specialized Training

Advanced technical training

Technical training programs for IT teams in the latest cybersecurity techniques and tools.

The Problem

95% of incidents originate from human error. Teams need continuous training on emerging threats.

Our Solution

Hands-on programs with real labs, recognized certifications, and personalized progress tracking.

Key Benefits

  • 70% reduction in human error incidents
  • Internationally recognized certifications
  • Improved team response time
  • Measurable ROI in technical skills

What's included?

  • Ethical hacking and pentesting
  • Digital forensic analysis
  • Secure coding practices
  • Cloud security (AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • Incident response and threat hunting

Deliverables

  • Completion certificates
  • Permanent practice labs
  • Updated reference material
  • Skills assessments
  • Cybersecurity career plan
